titleStmt.title: A congratulatory poem, on the miraculous, and glorious return of that unparallel'd King Charls the II. May 29. 1660. By Alex. Brome.
titleStmt.author: Brome, Alexander, 1620-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Henry Brome at the Gun in Ivy-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
